title: Refine Project Scope and Requirements for TimeLordAI
description: Revise and expand the requirements gathering process for the TimeLordAI project. Conduct comprehensive stakeholder interviews, market research, and SWOT analysis to thoroughly understand the problem space, target use cases across various industries, desired features, key performance indicators (KPIs), potential risks/constraints, and application areas. Document the refined requirements, clearly define project scope, goals & objectives, and ensure they are communicated effectively to all team members. Collaborate with other team members to clarify and prioritize tasks.

title: Design System Architecture - Revised
description: Revised design of the overall system architecture for TimeLordAI, including components, data flow, and integration points. Considering scalability, fault tolerance, high availability, data ingestion, processing, storage, serving layers, security, monitoring best practices, and industry-specific use cases. The revised design includes: 1) Microservices architecture using Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration. 2) Streaming data pipelines with Apache Kafka for real-time data processing and ingestion. 3) Data storage solutions like TimescaleDB for time-series data management and PostgreSQL for general purpose data. 4) A robust API layer using FastAPI for serving the workflows. 5) Implementing serverless functions for cost efficiency and scalability. 6) Deployment on cloud services like AWS or Google Cloud Platform for infrastructure needs. 7) To enhance security, consider implementing OAuth2.0 authentication and authorization, along with encryption at rest and in transit. 8) For monitoring best practices, implement Prometheus and Grafana for monitoring the system.

title: Define Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Design and implement the data ingestion and processing pipeline for time series data. This includes data sources, data formats, data cleaning, and feature engineering.

title: Develop Forecasting Models
description: Research and develop forecasting models and algorithms suitable for various time series use cases. This may include classical statistical models, machine learning models, and deep learning models.
dependencies: Define Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Build User Interface and Visualization
description: Design and develop the user interface and visualization components for TimeLordAI. This includes dashboards, data exploration tools, and model performance visualizations.

title: Implement Model Management and Deployment
description: Develop a model management and deployment system for TimeLordAI. This includes model versioning, model serving, and model monitoring.

title: Set up Infrastructure and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and DevOps processes for TimeLordAI, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, monitoring, and logging.

title: Implement Security and Compliance
description: Ensure that TimeLordAI adheres to security best practices and industry compliance standards. This includes data encryption, access control, and auditing.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing and Quality Assurance Strategy
description: Create a robust testing strategy encompassing unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for TimeLordAI. This strategy should include test cases for various use cases across different industries, focusing on ensuring the quality of our end-to-end managed time series workflows. The strategy must be scalable, adaptable, and maintainable to accommodate changes during the development process. Include a plan for continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) for smooth deployment.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for TimeLordAI, covering installation, configuration, usage, and troubleshooting.
